text:
Hi all,

I used the `plotting.plot_connectome` function with `black_bg=True`, but when figure is displayed I could not see the brain contour. I use matplotlib 1.5 github version.
After digging out in the nilearn code I found that in the `glass_brain.py` file the first line of code
`black_bg = ax.get_axis_bgcolor() == 'k'
title: Issue with matplotlib dev version and plot_brain_schematics
